author: senh
title: Simon Cowell replacing Stern on NBC's 'America's Got Talent'
text: BING NEWS: Simon Cowell joins ‘America’s Got Talent’ as new judge is joining NBC’s hit show “America’s Got Talent” next season, the network announced on Thursday. Cowell, 56, will be replacing another outspoken judge, radio personality Howard Stern, for the 11th season of the reality competition series. 10/22/2015 - 5:31 am | View Link Simon Cowell replaces Howard Stern on NBC’s ‘America’s Got Talent’ NEW YORK, N.Y. – Simon Cowell is heading back in front of the cameras, replacing Howard Stern as a judge on NBC’s series “America’s Got Talent.” NBC announced Thursday that Cowell, one of the show’s producers and creators of the format ... 10/22/2015 - 5:25 am | View Link Simon Cowell Replacing Stern on NBC's 'America's Got Talent' Simon Cowell is heading back in front of the cameras, replacing Howard Stern as a judge on NBC's series "America's Got Talent." NBC announced Thursday that Cowell, one of the show's producers and creators of the format, will start next season. The show has ... 10/22/2015 - 5:11 am | View Link 'America's Got Talent' 2015 Finale Bids Farewell To Judge Howard Stern; Will Simon Cowell Replace Him In Season 11? After a long and strange run as a judge on NBC’s ... “America’s Got Talent” executive producer Simon Cowell, whom fans of the early seasons of “American Idol” and “X Factor” will note has quite a bit of experience judging for reality TV ... 09/17/2015 - 4:11 am | View Link Dog Act on Simon Cowell’s ‘Britain’s Got Talent’ Under Investigation After Sparking Scandal (Here’s the Controversial Performance) Simon Cowell of “American Idol” and “The X Factor” is the creator of the show and serves on the judging panel. He reportedly said he ‘felt like a bit of an idiot” after being taken in by a substitute dog used in the act. The U.K. regulatory ...
